org.hps.online.recon.aida

Class RemoteAidaDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.online.recon.aida.RemoteAidaDriver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExampleDriver, HPSMonitoring2021, JustEcal

    public class RemoteAidaDriver
extends Driver
    Driver for providing remote AIDA functionality Some basic event performance plots are also implemented.
